short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cycle through your most recently used tabs (MRU) like Alt+Tab, but, with the shortcut keys Ctrl+Q or Ctrl+`(~) or assign your own!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Just like using Alt+Tab for Windows except now for your browser tabs. Use Ctrl+Tab or Ctrl+Q or Ctrl+`(~) or assign your own shortcut key for swapping back and forth between your last viewed tabs.
